sentences.en: A number of bombs have exploded, seriously injuring at least five people.
sentences.cn: 一些炸弹爆炸了，至少5人严重受伤。

sentences.en: Angus injured his leg playing rugby.
sentences.cn: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

sentences.en: Daniel: The important thing to point out, didn't injure the cameraman!
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔: 我必须指出,重要是, 没伤到摄影师!

sentences.en: God forbid that he should injure you!
He will never set you at defiance or willfully injure you.
sentences.cn: 他决不会违抗你,或者存心伤害你.

sentences.en: I was told to beware lest I ( should ) injure him.
sentences.cn: 有人关照我,要我小心别伤害他.

sentences.en: If you go on at that rate, you will injure your health.
sentences.cn: 你如果照这样子继续下去, 你会损害健康的.

sentences.en: It can be no light matter for the Home Office that so many young prisoners should have wanted to kill or injure themselves.
sentences.cn: 竟然有那么多的年轻囚犯试图自杀或自残，内政部决不可等闲视之。

sentences.en: It'seems that the further cats fall, the less they are likely to injure themselves.
sentences.cn: 看起来,猫跌落的距离越长,它们就越不会伤害自己.

sentences.en: Methods : To analyze 36 cases of severe chest injure accepted in hospital.
sentences.cn: 方法:分析总结以往我院诊治的重度胸外伤病例36例.

sentences.en: Often dance can you bring about knee joint motile to injure?
sentences.cn: 经常跳舞会导致膝关节运动型损伤 吗 ?

sentences.en: Old Zhiyun: Yakou Temple , Ying - Yuan dumping injure, Canbei base address remaining.
sentences.cn: 旧志云: 崖口古寺, 楹垣倾圮, 残碑基址仅存.

sentences.en: The bull may injure the horses used in the ring.
sentences.cn: 牛只在斗牛场中可能对马造成伤害.

sentences.en: To weaken, injure, or impair, often by degrees or imperceptibly; sap.
sentences.cn: 逐渐损坏;暗中破坏:削弱 、 伤害或损害, 常是逐渐地或很轻微地; 使衰弱.

sentences.en: Will it wear, you think, and won't the rain injure it?
sentences.cn: 你说这经久耐用吗?不会一淋雨就坏 吗 ?

sentences.en: You do not go out to injure opponents.
You will only injure yourself if take notice of despicable enemies.
sentences.cn: 如果去在意卑劣的敌人,反而会身受其害.

trans.tran_en: to say unfair or unpleasant things that hurt someone’s pride, feelings etc

trans.tran_cn: 伤害； 损坏， 损害， 损伤
trans.tran_en: If you injure a person or animal, you damage some part of their body
